1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using the Instagram DM Automation application ("the Service", "the App") operated by SMARTBREW ("we", "our", "the Company", or "SMARTBREW"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our Service.

About SMARTBREW and This Application: SMARTBREW is the business entity that owns, develops, and operates the Instagram DM Automation application. This Terms of Service applies specifically to the Instagram DM Automation tool developed by SMARTBREW, available at https://instagram-bot-rust.vercel.app (web interface) and https://instagram-bot-xmt8.onrender.com (backend API). SMARTBREW is responsible for all aspects of this Service, including data processing, security, and user support.

Connection to App: These Terms of Service are directly connected to the Instagram DM Automation application. The application is owned and operated by SMARTBREW, and these terms govern your use of that specific application.

2. Description of Service

Instagram DM Automation is a messaging support tool that helps businesses manage Instagram Direct Messages through a centralized web interface. The Service allows you to:

  • Connect your Instagram Business Account to receive and manage Direct Messages
  • View and respond to customer messages through our web interface
  • Access customer profile information to better assist with inquiries
  • Manage multiple conversations and message threads

3. Account Registration and Requirements

To use our Service, you must:

  • Be at least 18 years old or have parental consent
  • Have a valid Instagram Business Account
  • Provide accurate and complete registration information
  • Maintain the security of your account credentials
  • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
  • Comply with Meta's Platform Terms and Instagram API policies

You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account.

4. Instagram Account Connection

When you connect your Instagram Business Account to our Service:

  • You grant us permission to access your Instagram account via Meta's Instagram Graph API
  • You authorize us to receive Direct Messages sent to your Instagram Business Account
  • You authorize us to send replies on behalf of your Instagram Business Account
  • You understand that we will store your Page Access Token securely for API access
  • You can disconnect your Instagram account at any time through the Service

You must have the legal authority to connect the Instagram Business Account and grant these permissions. You are responsible for ensuring your use of the Service complies with Instagram's Terms of Service and Community Guidelines.

5. Acceptable Use and Prohibited Activities

You agree not to use the Service to:

  • Violate any applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights
  • Send spam, unsolicited messages, bulk messages, or engage in harassment
  • Impersonate others or provide false information
  • Interfere with or disrupt the Service, servers, or network infrastructure
  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Service or other users' accounts
  • Use the Service for any illegal, fraudulent, or unauthorized purpose
  • Violate Meta's Platform Terms, Instagram API policies, or Developer Policies
  • Send messages that violate Instagram's Community Guidelines or Terms of Service
  • Use Instagram Platform Data for purposes other than messaging support (e.g., advertising, marketing, data mining)
  • Share, sell, or transfer Instagram Platform Data to unauthorized third parties
  • Reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the Service
  • Use automated systems or bots to abuse the Service or Instagram API
  • Violate any intellectual property rights of SMARTBREW, Meta, or third parties

Enforcement: Violation of these acceptable use terms may result in immediate termination of your account and access to the Service, without refund or notice.

6. Meta Platform Terms Compliance

Your use of this Service is subject to Meta's Platform Terms, Instagram API policies, Developer Policies, and all applicable Meta requirements. You agree to:

  • Comply with all Meta Platform Terms, Instagram API policies, and Developer Policies
  • Use Instagram Platform Data only as permitted by Meta's policies and our Privacy Policy
  • Not use Instagram Platform Data for advertising, marketing, or any purpose other than messaging support
  • Respect user privacy and data protection requirements as outlined in Meta's policies
  • Not share Instagram Platform Data with unauthorized third parties
  • Comply with all restrictions on Instagram Platform Data usage, including data minimization principles
  • Only use the instagram_basic and instagram_manage_messages permissions for their intended purposes
  • Not violate Instagram's Community Guidelines or Terms of Service
  • Maintain compliance with Meta's Platform Terms throughout your use of the Service

Consequences of Non-Compliance: Violation of Meta's Platform Terms may result in immediate termination of your access to the Service, deletion of your account, and potential action by Meta, including suspension of your Instagram account or Meta Developer account.

Our Compliance: SMARTBREW operates this Service in compliance with Meta's Platform Terms and Instagram API policies. We are committed to maintaining this compliance and will take appropriate action if users violate these terms.

Instagram content, including messages and profile information, remains the property of Instagram and Meta. You are granted a limited license to access and use this content through our Service in accordance with Meta's Platform Terms.

11. Termination

We may terminate or suspend your access to the Service at any time, with or without cause or notice, for any reason, including:

  • Violation of these Terms of Service

  • Fraudulent or illegal activity

You may terminate your account at any time by disconnecting your Instagram account and requesting account deletion. Upon termination, your access to the Service will cease, and we may delete your account data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

12. Data and Privacy

Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy (available at https://instagram-bot-rust.vercel.app/privacy-policy), which explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using the Service, you consent to our data practices as described in the Privacy Policy.

Instagram Platform Data: We handle Instagram Platform Data in accordance with Meta's Platform Terms, Instagram API policies, and our Privacy Policy. You are responsible for ensuring your use of customer data and messages complies with applicable privacy laws, regulations, and Meta's requirements.

Your Responsibilities: You are responsible for:

  • Obtaining necessary consents from Instagram users before sending messages
